longBusinessSummary: WeedHire International, Inc. provides green technology solutions. It manages the equipment disposition needs of government and commercial clients by buying, reselling, or recycling computers and other technology hardware. The company provides a suite of information technology asset disposition services. It offers various programs comprising RecycleToday, an immediate environmentally compliant downstream disposition program; and RecycleTomorrow, a budgeting for the disposal of equipment in conjunction with new product purchases that would become obsolete. The company also provides a range of services that support redeployment/remarketing programs, such as conducting a detailed analysis of retired equipment, customized business intelligence-based reporting, and recommending a course of action. In addition, it offers logistics and transportation services, including Web-based E-waste pickup request tool; onsite packaging and removal; data erasure or destruction; onsite per system software padlock to ensure safe transport of customer data; IT asset serial number scanning; transport with optional global positing satellite tracking; and armored truck transport, as well as data security services, which focus on data erasure, destruction, and on-site destruction techniques. The company also operates WeedHire.com, an online portal and social media source for job seekers and providers within the legal cannabis industry. Its Website provides job postings for cannabis jobs, such as recommending physicians, physician's assistants, growers, budtenders, dispensary operators, security guards, dispensary administrators, lighting specialist, delivery drivers, lab techs, marketing specialists, lawyers, insurance agents, and government jobs. The company was formerly known as AnythingIT, Inc. and changed its name to WeedHire International, Inc. in November 2014. WeedHire International, Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Fair Lawn, New Jersey.
